Windlord/Nightlight::

Windlord wished that Termitron left the room and he knew that He 
didn't leave the room without know that Nighlight was safe. 

"Termitron..." said the hawk in low voice "Why don't you go and check 
that Trinity..."

"I  WONT LEAVE THE QUEEN ALONE WITH HIM" screamed the bot.

"Listen me" said kindly Windlord with low voice "Aerotaur will pick 
up her and she will rest in a cr, you leave Trinity with Technosis 
and after you left Trynity with her, you can go to cr's and take care 
her.. I'll keep an eye that Gramps doesn't annoy her"

"Just if Aero-bot, it's agree.." replied Termitron

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He felt guilty for having shot Gramps so many times.  He walks 
over and 
> reaches down to take the gun out of Gramps' hand.
